data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Describe a wedding or other family ceremony you attended.
data.answer: I would like to describe a wedding that I had ever attended, which was my brother's wedding. His wedding was held two years ago in Nanjing, which was located in the south of China. All of my family members, which can be illustrated by my parents, my grandparents and my uncle, attended his wedding ceremony. Moreover, some distant relatives also went to celebrate my brother's wedding in Nanjing. All of us prepared red pockets for my brother and his wife in order to express our happiness. Besides, we also bought exquisite gifts for my brother and his new house. All in all, this was a wedding ceremony that I had attended before.

options.content: Who else was at the ceremony?
